trans-unit.source: Represents the legend for the chart image.
trans-unit.target: 表示圖表影像的圖例。

trans-unit.source: The Legend class encapsulates all the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control's legend, and is exposed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A> collection property of the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 圖例類別封裝的所有功能<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項的圖例，並且使用公開<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A>集合的根屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: There can be any number of legends for a chart image.
trans-unit.target: 可以有任意數目的圖表影像的圖例。

trans-unit.source: Legends can: - Be docked and aligned.
trans-unit.target: 圖例可以:-停駐和對齊。

trans-unit.source: - Be displayed inside or outside the plotted chart areas.
trans-unit.target: -顯示內部或外部繪製的圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: - Automatically fit their contents.
trans-unit.target: 自動符合其內容。

trans-unit.source: - Use a predefined style, such as row, column or table.
trans-unit.target: -使用預先定義的樣式，例如資料列、 資料行或資料表。

trans-unit.source: - Use hatching, gradient colors and background images.
trans-unit.target: -使用影線、 漸層色彩和背景影像。

trans-unit.source: - Be sized and positioned anywhere within the chart image.
trans-unit.target: -調整大小並放在圖表影像的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: Legend items are represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> object, and are either default or custom items.
trans-unit.target: 圖例項目都由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>物件，並為預設或自訂項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: Custom items are not associated with data, and can be added, deleted and modified using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自訂項目為相關聯的資料，並可以加入、 刪除和修改使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default items are by default automatically added to the legend, and are the names of the plotted data points for doughnut and pie charts.
trans-unit.target: 預設項目是依預設自動加入至圖例中，而且是環圈圖和圓餅圖的繪製的資料點名稱。

trans-unit.source: For all other chart types, the default items are the names of the plotted data series.
trans-unit.target: 對於所有其他圖表類型，預設項目會繪製的資料數列的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Each series has a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Legend%2A> property that defines the name of the legend that will be used.
trans-unit.target: 每個數列都有<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Legend%2A>屬性，定義將用於圖例的名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Legend%2A>

trans-unit.source: A legend item will not be created for a series if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.IsVisibleInLegend%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 圖例項目將不會建立一系列如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.IsVisibleInLegend%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.IsVisibleInLegend%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text for these default items can be changed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用變更這些預設項目的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property will allow you to specify predefined keywords that will be replaced by their appropriate values at run-time.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您指定預先定義的關鍵字會被適當的值在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: If you have a pie chart and you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A> property, it will also set the legend text to the value you set for the labels.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有圓形圖，而且設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A>屬性，它就也設定圖例文字為您設定標籤的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the text to a different value, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要的文字設為不同的值，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, you would want to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A> property to "#AXISLABEL" or "#VALX".
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，您可能要設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>"#AXISLABEL"或"#VALX"的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Legend series symbols are rectangles, dots or lines.
trans-unit.target: 圖例數列符號為矩形、 點或線條。

trans-unit.source: The symbol type is set automatically by the chart and depends on the plotted chart type.
trans-unit.target: 符號類型的圖表會自動設定，並繪製的圖表類型而定。

trans-unit.source: Legend text by default is automatically sized.
trans-unit.target: 預設的圖例文字自動調整大小。

trans-unit.source: You can disable automatic sizing of legend text by disabling the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由停用停用自動調整大小圖例文字的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, the size of the legend text is determined by the Size property of the legend <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Font%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`false`，圖例文字的大小取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Font%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Font%2A>圖例的大小屬性

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A> property is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.AutoFitMinFontSize%2A> property determines the minimum font size that a legend item can have when resizing.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>啟用屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.AutoFitMinFontSize%2A>屬性決定圖例項目可以有時調整大小的最小字型大小。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.AutoFitMinFontSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A> property defines a limit on the number of characters that can be shown on one line before text is wrapped to another line.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>屬性會定義可以在同一行顯示文字換行到另一列之前的字元數目限制。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not wish to wrap text in the legend, set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A> property to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想在圖例文字換行，設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>屬性為零。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, when the entire legend text does not fit in the legend, the text will be truncated.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，當整個圖例文字無法容納在圖例中，文字會被截斷。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A> on the legend to get the text to wrap instead of being truncated.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>的圖例，若要取得的文字換行而不是被截斷。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the contents of the legend cannot fit into the given space, legend entries are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果圖例的內容無法放入指定的空白字元，圖例項目會被截斷。

trans-unit.source: An ellipsis will be shown to indicate that there are more entries than the legend has space for.
trans-unit.target: 表示已超過圖例沒有空間可供更多的項目，將會顯示省略符號。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the legend items from being truncated, set the position and size of the legend using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Size%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止圖例項目被截斷，將設定的位置和大小圖例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Size%2A>屬性，分別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Size%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: When setting the legend position or size, the chart can no longer automatically position the elements in the chart.
trans-unit.target: 當設定圖例位置或大小，圖表不會再自動可以圖表中放置項目。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, you many need to manually position other chart elements to achieve the desired appearance.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，您需要以手動方式置於 其他圖表項目，來達成所要的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Another option would be to define your own cell columns instead of using the default legend settings.
trans-unit.target: 另一個選項，可定義您自己的資料格資料行，而不是使用預設的圖例設定。

trans-unit.source: The Legend object has a CellColumn Collection; each CellColumn object represents a column in the Legend.
trans-unit.target: 圖例物件具有 CellColumn 集合。每個 CellColumn 物件代表在圖例中的資料行。

trans-unit.source: A cell column has <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MaximumWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> properties that can be used to adjust the size of the columns.
trans-unit.target: 資料格資料行具有<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MaximumWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>屬性可用來調整資料行的大小。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MaximumWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the legend contains many entries, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRows%2A> can be used to improve readability.
trans-unit.target: 當圖例會包含多項目，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRows%2A>可用來改善可讀性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to True, it will display a back color that you can set using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為 True 時，它會顯示您可以使用設定背景色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the legend is positioned in the top-right corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，圖例位於圖表右上角。

trans-unit.source: This position can be modified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A> properties of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 這個位置可以修改使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A>圖例的內容。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>

trans-unit.source: The legend can also be associated with a chart area by use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 圖例也可以使用關聯與圖表區域<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the name of the chart area for which the legend should be docked.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性指定的圖例停駐在圖表區域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> property can be used to display the legend inside a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>屬性可以用來顯示圖表區域內圖例。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> is set to False, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.MaximumAutoSize%2A> property defines the maximum size, in percent, of the legend within the available chart when the legend is automatically positioned.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>設為 False，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.MaximumAutoSize%2A>屬性定義百分比，圖例會自動放置時可用的圖表中圖例的大小上限。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.MaximumAutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property should be set if you wish to adjust the width or height of the legend after the docking properties have been set.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要調整的寬度或高度的圖例停駐的內容已設定之後，應該設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The legend can be modified using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用修改圖例<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint"></xref> class with the specified legend name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint"></xref>類別具有指定的圖例名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The legend can be aligned so that it is <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>, <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> or <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>; its alignment is also affected by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 圖例可以對齊，使其具備<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>，<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>或<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>; 也會影響其對齊<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>

trans-unit.source: If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> is to the left; if it is docked to the left or right, <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> is at the top.
trans-unit.target: 如果圖例停駐在頂部或底部，<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>是左邊; 如果它停駐在左邊或右邊，<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>位於最上層。</xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> property setting is just the opposite, and aligns the legend to the right or the bottom, depending on where it is docked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>屬性設定為剛好相反，並將對齊圖例的右方或下方，根據停駐位置。</xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> always centers the legend, either vertically or horizontally.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>垂直或水平中央圖例。</xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>

trans-unit.source: Setting the Alignment property will have no effect if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 設定 [對齊] 屬性將會有任何作用，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>屬性未設定至<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: A .NET Framework <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that represents the alignment of the legend.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref>代表圖例的對齊方式的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum font size that can be used by the autofitting algorithm for the legend text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可供圖例文字自動調整演算法的最小字型大小。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the minimum font size.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>值，表示最小字型大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of a legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The BackColor value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background.
trans-unit.target: 背景色彩值會是如果您已指定背景漸層色彩使用的第一個色彩。

trans-unit.source: The alpha value controls the opacity of a color.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 值會控制色彩的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定此色彩為"透明"— 也就是如果您使用 0 的 alpha 值-無色彩會指派給圖例的背景。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the background will be transparent.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，背景會變成透明。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the background color of a legend.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，表示圖例的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is [System.Drawing.Color.White](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩是[System.Drawing.Color.White](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的背景漸層的方向。

trans-unit.source: Also determines whether a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: 也會決定是否要使用的漸層。

trans-unit.source: Use the BackGradientStyle property to determine whether a legend will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BackGradientStyle 屬性來判斷是否圖例會顯示漸層，並用來判斷所使用漸層的方向，如果有一個。

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available patterns, refer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的模式的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors: Set the primary color of the legend background with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用漸層色彩︰ 設定主要背景的色彩圖例與<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the secondary color of the legend background with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定次要背景色彩的圖例與<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this BackGradientStyle property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: 這個 BackGradientStyle 屬性設為所需的漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration that represents the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>列舉型別表示的圖例背景漸層的方向。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的影線樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>列舉值會指定使用的型別<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>筆刷規劃圖樣</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: 規劃圖樣包含透明的背景色彩和背景上繪製的直線。

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用影線樣式的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: **Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**影線線條的色彩由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration that represents the hatching style of a legend.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>列舉，表示影線樣式的圖例。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of a legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a path to a background image for a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性定義的背景影像路徑<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>圖例中，而且可以是絕對或相對的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: To position the image, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定影像位置，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定其中一個設定為"透明 」 映像所顯示的色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
trans-unit.target: 映像可能源自任何支援的.NET Framework 中，包括圖示的有效圖形檔。

trans-unit.source: Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.
trans-unit.target: 背景影像的優先順序高於其他背景屬性，例如漸層色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示影像檔案的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image alignment used for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> drawing mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於背景影像對齊<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref>繪圖模式。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the alignment of the background image for the legend; it is only applied when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性決定圖例; 的背景影像的對齊方式只套用在下列情況才<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the background image alignment.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref>列舉值，表示背景影像對齊。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定將會以透明的色彩取代，當繪製背景影像的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be displayed as transparent.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>將透明的形式顯示的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode of a legend background image.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例背景影像繪圖模式。

trans-unit.source: The BackImageWrapMode property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: BackImageWrapMode 屬性可讓您決定如何顯示的影像。映像可以並排顯示，縮放等等。

trans-unit.source: If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 如果縮放的影像，將會自動縮放以符合圖例的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像會並排顯示，它會重複繪製，從圖例的左上角開始。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用文繞圖模式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>列舉主題。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: If the BackImageWrapMode property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>, the location where the image is drawn is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果 BackImageWrapMode 屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>，其中繪製影像的位置由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> enumeration value that represents the drawing mode of a legend background image.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref>列舉值，表示圖例背景影像繪圖模式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例背景次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: The BackSecondaryColor property determines the secondary background color of many <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: BackSecondaryColor 屬性會決定次要背景色彩，許多<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件，並套用漸層色彩時，才能使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: You can set BackSecondaryColor to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定 BackSecondaryColor 任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值。

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the BackSecondaryColor property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用影線，BackSecondaryColor 屬性會決定圖例影線線條的色彩。

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for the background of a legend: - Set the primary color with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的圖例背景漸層色彩:-設定主要色彩與<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the secondary color with the BackSecondaryColor property.
trans-unit.target: -設定與 BackSecondaryColor 屬性的次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackGradientStyle%2A>屬性所需的漸層樣式。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>所使用之背景的影線或漸層填滿的次要色彩值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the border color of a legend.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，表示圖例的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of a legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: The BorderDashStyle property determines the line style to use for a border.
trans-unit.target: BorderDashStyle 屬性會決定要用於框線的線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 可以是實線、 虛線，等等。

trans-unit.source: For other border styles, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: 其他的框線樣式，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>列舉主題。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the border style of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>列舉值，決定圖表元素的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of a legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的框線寬度。

trans-unit.source: Note that BorderWidth property can also set the width of lines in such elements as line charts, custom legend items displayed with a "line" style, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，BorderWidth 屬性也可以設定線條的寬度為折線圖，顯示"line"樣式等等的自訂圖例項目這類項目中。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that determines the border width, in pixels, of the legend.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>值，決定框線的寬度，以像素的圖例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnCollection"></xref> for a legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnCollection"></xref>圖例。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnCollection"></xref> object for a legend.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnCollection"> </xref>圖例的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object used for custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>自訂圖例項目所使用的物件。

trans-unit.source: This collection property can be used to add, delete or modify custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合屬性可用來加入、 刪除或修改自訂圖例項目。

trans-unit.source: Custom legend items, unlike default legend items, do not have associated series or data points.
trans-unit.target: 自訂圖例項目，不同於預設圖例項目，並沒有相關聯的數列或資料點。

trans-unit.source: To modify legend items, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改的圖例項目，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object used for custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref>自訂圖例項目所使用的物件。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> where the legend will be docked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref>會停駐的圖例。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> where this legend will be docked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref>會停駐此圖例。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines where the legend is docked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會決定圖例停駐位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> can be docked to the top, left, bottom or right of either the entire chart image, or the inside or outside of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>可以停駐的頂端、 左邊、 底部或右邊的整個圖表影像或內部或外部的圖表區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> property is set to `false`, docking applies to the entire chart image.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>屬性設定為`false`，停駐套用至整個圖表影像。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> property is set to `true`, docking applies to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> property This property has no effect if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>屬性設定為`true`，停駐適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>所指定物件<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>如果這個屬性就不會影響屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>屬性未設定至<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking"></xref> enumeration value that determines where the legend is docked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking"> </xref>列舉值，決定圖例停駐位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if the legend is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，判斷是否已啟用的圖例。

trans-unit.source: To hide a legend, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏圖例，請將此屬性設`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if legend is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用的圖例。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object, which is used to set font properties of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>物件，用來設定圖例的字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to change the properties of this <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object at run time, a compilation error will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Font>物件在執行階段，會發生編譯錯誤。</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: To set font properties at run time, you must create a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要在執行階段設定字型屬性，您必須建立新<xref:System.Drawing.Font>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the Legend.Font.Size property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A> property will be set to false.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定 Legend.Font.Size 屬性時，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>屬性會設定為 false。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A> property to true, this property will be reset to its default, which is 8 points.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>屬性設定為 true，這個屬性會重設為其預設值為 8 點。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object which is used to set font properties of the legend.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>物件用來設定圖例的字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the legend text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The ForeColor property is used to set the legend text color.
trans-unit.target: ForeColor 屬性用來設定圖例文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the color of the legend text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，表示圖例文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visual separator type for the legend header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例標頭視覺分隔符號類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the visual separator type for the legend header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"> </xref>代表圖例標題視覺分隔符號類型列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the separator for the legend header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例標題分隔符號色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the color of the separator for the legend header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>代表圖例標題分隔符號的色彩值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the chart area in which the legend is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在其中繪製圖例之圖表區域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示圖表區域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates if legend rows will be drawn with interlaced background color.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指出是否要以交錯的背景色彩繪製圖例資料列的旗標。

trans-unit.source: When the legend contains many entries, the InterlacedRows property can be used to improve readability.
trans-unit.target: 當圖例會包含多項目時，InterlacedRows 屬性可用來改善可讀性。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the legend will display a background color for the rows that are interlaced, which can be set using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，圖例會顯示的資料列會交錯式，可在設定使用的背景色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value that determines whether alternating rows in the legend are drawn with a specified color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref>會決定是否使用指定的色彩繪製圖例中的交替資料列的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the legend's interlaced rows.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例交錯資料列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable if interlaced rows are used.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性僅適用於會使用交錯式資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the background color of the legend's interlaced rows.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，表示背景色彩的圖例，交錯式資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the legend is docked inside or outside the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，指出是否圖例停駐的內部或外部的圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: This property will only have an effect if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> property is set to the name of a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性只會有影響，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>屬性設定為名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> property is set to any value other than <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>, the IsDockedInsideChartArea property also has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>以外屬性設定為任何值<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>，IsDockedInsideChartArea 屬性也會有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is because the position of the legend is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為圖例的位置由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the legend is docked inside the chart area; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is docked outside the chart area.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果圖例停駐在圖表區域; 內，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果停駐在圖表區域外。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether all legend items are equally spaced.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，指出所有圖例項目是否為等都間距。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if legend items are equally spaced; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if they are not.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果圖例項目為等間距。，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果它們不是。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the legend text is automatically sized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，指出是否自動調整大小圖例文字。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the legend text is automatically sized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果圖例文字自動調整大小;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visual separator type for the legend table columns.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例資料表資料行視覺分隔符號類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the visual separator type for the legend table columns.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"> </xref>代表圖例資料表資料行視覺分隔符號類型列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the legend table column separator.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例資料表資料行分隔符號的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the color of the legend table column separator.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值用來繪製圖例資料表資料行分隔符號的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the legend table column spacing.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例資料表資料行間距。

trans-unit.source: The ItemColumnSpacing property value is calculated as a percentage of the legend text font.
trans-unit.target: ItemColumnSpacing 屬性值的計算方式為圖例文字字型的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the table column spacing.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>代表資料表資料行間距的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies the order in which legend items are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定的順序顯示圖例項目中的旗標。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects legend items automatically added for the chart series; it has no effect on custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響圖例項目自動加入到圖表數列。它沒有任何作用對自訂圖例項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder>, the legend will automatically be reversed if StackedColumn, StackedColumn100, StackedArea or StackedArea100 chart types are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder>，如果使用 StackedColumn、 StackedColumn100、 StackedArea 或 StackedArea100 圖表類型，將會自動反轉圖例。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the order in which legend items are displayed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder"> </xref>列舉值，指定在哪個圖例中顯示的項目順序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的樣式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the legend is displayed as a series of items in a table.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，圖例會顯示為一系列的資料表中的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether to expand items in the table width-wise or height-wise by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定是否要藉由設定展開資料表中的項目 width-wise 或 height-wise<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendTableStyle>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control will determine whether to draw a wide table or a tall table, depending on the alignment and positioning of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendTableStyle>、<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項將會決定是否要繪製寬型資料表或高型資料表，根據的對齊方式和位置的圖表。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendTableStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This may cause the legend to be drawn using multiple legend item columns.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會造成要使用多個圖例項目資料行來繪製的圖例。

trans-unit.source: There are three possible styles for a legend: Column, Row and Table.
trans-unit.target: 有三個可能的圖例樣式︰ 資料行、 資料列和資料表。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the table below for a summary of these styles: ||| |-|-| |Style|Description| |Column|Legend items are displayed in one column, with multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 下表摘要這些樣式的參考: | | | |-|-| |樣式 |描述 | |資料行 |圖例項目會顯示在具有多個資料列的一個資料行。

trans-unit.source: Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart.| |Row|Legend items are displayed in one row, with multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 圖例停駐左邊或右邊的圖表時，最常使用。 | |資料列 |圖例項目會顯示在具有多個資料行的一個資料列。

trans-unit.source: Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the top or bottom of the chart.| |Table|Legend items are displayed using multiple columns and rows.|
trans-unit.target: 圖例停駐於上方或下方圖表時，最常使用。 | |資料表 |圖例項目會顯示使用多個資料行和資料列。 |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the legend style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle"> </xref>列舉值，決定圖例樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size of the legend, measured as a percentage of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例中，以圖表區域的百分比表示的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: This value is used by the automatic layout algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是由自動配置演算法。

trans-unit.source: If the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart area, this property determines the maximum width of the legend, which is measured as a percentage of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 如果圖例停駐於圖表區域的左右，此屬性會決定圖例中，以圖表區域的百分比的最大寬度。

trans-unit.source: If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, this property determines the maximum height of the legend, which is also measured as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 如果圖例停駐在頂部或底部，此屬性會決定圖例中，也會以百分比表示的最大高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float " name="float " href=""></xref>value that represents the maximum size of the legend.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float " name="float " href=""></xref>代表圖例的大小上限的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the legend.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示圖例的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref> object, which can be used to get or set the position of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref>物件，可用來取得或設定圖例的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the Position property is automatic (that is, Legend.Position.Auto = `true`) the legend position is calculated automatically by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, taking into account the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Position 屬性為自動時 (也就是 Legend.Position.Auto = `true`) 圖例的位置會自動計算<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項，列入考量<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: If it is not automatic, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> properties are ignored, and the legend position is solely determined by the value of the returned <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是自動、 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>屬性會被忽略，和圖例的位置完全取決於傳回的值<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref> value that represents the position of the legend.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"> </xref>值，表示圖例的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto*>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以設定任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值。

trans-unit.source: The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 值可用來達到 「 實際 」 遮蔽的效果。「&128;,0,0,0"陰影的色彩值再試一次。

trans-unit.source: To implement a shadow, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.ShadowOffset%2A> property to a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 若要實作陰影，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.ShadowOffset%2A>屬性為零 (0) 以外的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.ShadowOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the shadow color of the legend.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，表示陰影色彩的圖例。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例的像素為單位的陰影位移。

trans-unit.source: To implement shadowing, set this property to a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 若要實作遮蔽，請將這個屬性設為零 (0) 以外的值。

trans-unit.source: A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right; a negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.
trans-unit.target: 正值會導致移往下及往右; 陰影負值會導致向上和向左移位的陰影。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the legend.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>表示圖例的像素為單位的陰影位移值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the legend table style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例表格樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.LegendStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性才適用如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.LegendStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.LegendStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendTableStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the legend table style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendTableStyle"> </xref>列舉值，指定圖例表格樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of characters that can be sequentially displayed in the legend before the text is wrapped.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可以依序之前，顯示在圖例文字換行的字元數。

trans-unit.source: When the legend text exceeds the value specified by this property, text will be automatically wrapped when the next whitespace character is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 當圖例文字超過這個屬性所指定的值時，遇到的下一個空白字元時自動換行文字。

trans-unit.source: Text will not be wrapped if there are no whitespace characters in the text.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何空白字元文字中，將未包裝文字。

trans-unit.source: Set the TextWrapThreshold property to zero to disable the feature.
trans-unit.target: 將 TextWrapThreshold 屬性設為零表示停用此功能。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the number of characters that can be placed in the legend sequentially before the text is wrapped.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>值，表示可以放在圖例中循序之前文字換行的字元數。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 25.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 25。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例標題的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the legend title text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>代表圖例標題文字的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例標題的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that represents the alignment of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref>代表圖例標題的對齊方式的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例標題的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the background of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值用來繪製圖例標題的背景。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font for the legend title.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例標題的字型。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to set font properties of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來設定圖例標題的字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to change the properties of this <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object at run time, a compilation error will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Font>物件在執行階段，會發生編譯錯誤。</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: To set font properties at run time, you must create a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要在執行階段設定字型屬性，您必須建立新<xref:System.Drawing.Font>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object that specifies font for the legend title.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>物件，指定圖例標題的字型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt, Bold".
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 「 Microsoft Sans Serif，8pt，粗體 」。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text color of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例標題的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the title text color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用來繪製標題文字色彩的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visual separator type for the legend title.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例標題視覺分隔符號類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref> value that represents the type of separator that will be drawn below the title.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"> </xref>值，表示要繪製的標題下方的分隔符號的類型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the legend title separator.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖例標題分隔符號的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the color of the legend title separator.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值用來繪製的圖例標題分隔符號色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。
